name: Tekton Labs
description: Tekton Labs is a technology consulting and software development company based in San Francisco. We specialize in devising and developing innovative technology solutions to help companies in terms of efficiency, automation, increase sales, cost reduction, among others. Basically, we help companies solve problems or achieve goals through technology.

locations.address: Av Juan de Aliaga 360, Magdalena del Mar - 5th Floor
